name: Imagine That (nocxtious, Erykgecko)
description:
Play as Samuel The Great, a knight on an adventure!

This is our first (somewhat rough) project/game for the Adventure Game Jam 104, so please excuse some of the bugs/imperfections!

INSTRUCTIONS: 

- Right Click: Swap action mode (Walk, Look At, Use, Pickup, Talk)

- Left Click: Use action

- Items in your inventory can be selected using the "Use" action.  Once selected they can be used with certain objects in the world, or combined with another inventory item to make something else
